item.title: Man once charged in missing wife's death: "I've done nothing wrong"
item.description: "They've got too much pride to say they're wrong," Barry Morphew said about authorities in Colorado.

item.title: Judge grants motion to dismiss charges in Suzanne Morphew case
item.description: The Colorado mother vanished in May 2020. Her husband, Barry, was about to go on trial for her murder.

item.title: Suzanne Morphew's body was moved after she was murdered, per indictment
item.description: Husband Barry Morphew rearrested as authorities link him to animal tranquilizers found in wife Suzanne Morphew's bone marrow.

item.title: Colorado man arrested a second time for his wife Suzanne Morphew's murder
item.description: The latest grand jury indictment against Barry Morphew alleges new details that are surprising even to those who've been following the case since his ...

item.title: Wife of murdered beauty exec maintains her innocence
item.description: Monica Sementilli goes on trial for conspiring to murder her celebrity hairdresser husband Fabio Sementilli.
